Title: Requires manufacturers to meet certain standards with their packaging in New York state to reduce waste
Summary: Requires manufacturers to meet certain standards with their packaging in New York state to reduce waste; establishes the guidelines and sets a timetable by which manufacturers must comply with these provisions.
LawCode: Add ยง27-0721, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the reduction and recycling of packaging
